titles: A tragedie of Abrahams sacrifice, written in french by Theodore Beza, and translated into Inglish, by A.G. Finished at Povvles Belchamp in Essex, the xj. of August. 1575
author: Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.
publisher: By Thomas Vautroullier dwelling in the Blacke Friers,
notes: A translation, by Arthur Golding, of Théodore de Bèze: Abraham sacrifiant, tragédie franc̜oise.
Some print show-through; date shaved on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Abraham --  (Biblical patriarch) --  Drama --  Early works to 1800.
